mapper.select: select region.id, region.common_region_id, region.region_name, region.postalcode from sys_region as region where region.region_name like '%市'
select region.id, region.common_region_id, region.region_name,region.up_region_id, region.postalcode from sys_region as region where region.region_name like '%区'
select region.id, region.common_region_id, region.region_name,region.up_region_id, region.postalcode from sys_region as region where region.region_name like '%街道'

select region.id, region.common_region_id, region.region_name ,region.up_region_id, region.postalcode from sys_region as region where region.up_region_id like CONCAT(#{areaId}, '%') and region.region_desc = '街道'

select DISTINCT r.id, r.common_region_id, r.region_name, r.region_desc, r.up_region_id, r.postalcode from sys_region as r left join sys_light_info as i on i.street_id = r.common_region_id where 1 = 1 and r.region_desc = '街道' and r.common_region_id like CONCAT(#{cityId}, '%') and r.up_region_id = #{areaId} and i.user_id = #{userId} order by r.id asc order by r.id desc
